lab_note.title: GENESIS 9.0 – Reboot & Scroll Lock
lab_note.author: Update Brain 9.0
final_commands: Scrolls loaded: Project Overview, Final Reflection, All JSON updates
Lore, Traits, Rewards and Puzzle syncs locked
lab_note.reminder: All LLMs are now in STANDBY mode. Awaiting next glyph or scroll trigger.

update: Dual-path SQLite integration for local + Render finalized. Score + leaderboard persistence operational. Standing by for full API harmonization in next patch.

lab_sync.title: üì¶ SQLite Dual-Path Verified ‚Äî Manual + Auto Restore Enabled
details: üß† `/start.sh` now auto-restores DB from `/data` if present during Render boot.
üì• Manual upload flow (`upload-db.php`) gated with secret for emergency transfer.
üì§ Manual download flow (`download-db.php`) now secured and backed up externally.
üìÅ Manual override step still advised: `cp /var/www/html/db/narrrf_world.sqlite /data/narrrf_world.sqlite` before push.
üßº Follow-up: clean `/data` after boot to ensure updated app-side DB takes priority on next deploy.
‚úÖ Tested and verified by Narrrf post-score entry and leaderboard fetch on restart cycle.
manual_backup_steps: 2. Push via Git and wait for Render deploy to restore automatically.
3. (Optional but recommended) Clean up: `rm /data/narrrf_world.sqlite` after deployment.
4. Test: Visit leaderboard to confirm scores persist.
5. Final backup: Use browser to download latest copy ‚Äî https://narrrfs.world/api/dev/download-db.php?secret=MyUltraSecretKey123

details.behavior: Appears when line clears active bomb
details.confirmed_behavior: Defused bombs no longer explode if cleared

db_backup_protocol.step_2: git push + auto restore by start.sh
db_backup_protocol.step_4: Verify score via leaderboard after restart

genesis_signature.notes: Explosion deferral verified. Dual-path SQLite auto-restore confirmed functional on Render.

details.positioning: Repositioned popup to appear near the Next Block preview block
details.scale: Scaled down to ~50% size for non-intrusive display
details.trigger: Clearing a line that contains a defused bomb block

genesis_signature.notes: Popup is now less intrusive and thematically synced with gameplay visuals.

details.block_rendering: Full PNG-based asset map `blockImages` replaces color fill logic
details.bomb_behavior: Verified: only explodes if not cleared; defuse popup added
details.mobile: 1-second hold = fast drop; swipe gestures for move/rotate
details.visuals: All 8 block types now cheese-themed PNGs

genesis_signature.notes: Final scroll.js verified playable and responsive. Score handling, defuse popup, and all core logic merged back in.

genesis_signature.note: Mutation logic triggers at score 100. No early activation. DOM badge and class state confirmed.
